SUMMARY: The customer inquired about the correct band size for an 8 1/2” wrist. The bot provided helpful, conditional guidance, explaining that both wrist size and watch case size are needed for an accurate recommendation, and successfully prompted the user for the missing case size information.

TECHNICAL_ERROR: NO

The bot successfully addressed the ambiguity, explaining that it likely refers to the original model and advising the customer to verify their watch generation (1, 2, or 3) to ensure the correct protector is selected. The interaction concluded with actionable suggestions.

TECHNICAL_ERROR: [YES] - The bot failed twice to retrieve dynamic product listings (sale items and specific model bands), citing temporary issues.
UNHAPPY_CUSTOMER: [NO] - The customer remained neutral throughout the interaction, pivoting successfully to a compatibility question after the retrieval errors.
ERROR_CATEGORY: [DATABASE_ERROR] - The errors occurred when the bot attempted to dynamically pull product information (sale items/model-specific bands) from its backend systems.
SUMMARY: [The customer initiated the session to shop sale items. The bot failed twice to retrieve dynamic product listings (sale items and Galaxy Watch 8 40mm bands), instead providing static links. However, the bot successfully answered a direct follow-up question regarding the compatibility of bands for the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 40mm model.]

TECHNICAL_ERROR: [YES] - The bot explicitly stated it was "having trouble retrieving Pebble Time 2 compatible bands from our catalog right now."
UNHAPPY_CUSTOMER: [NO] - The customer asked factual questions and did not express dissatisfaction.
ERROR_CATEGORY: [DATABASE_ERROR] - The bot failed to pull specific product information related to the requested watch model from the catalog/database.
SUMMARY: [The customer inquired about strap compatibility for a Pebble Time 2 (22mm quick-release). The bot correctly identified the necessary compatibility standard (22mm universal) but failed to retrieve specific product listings for that model from its catalog. It successfully guided the customer on what to search for manually.]

The bot experienced a technical error preventing it from fetching the specific product details or estimating delivery for that exact item. The bot redirected the user to browse the general collection and provided generalized shipping timelines instead.]
